texts.DisplayName:Artizan.IoT.Message.Cache.Ba: Device Data Cache Batch Write Threshold
Triggers batch write to cache when this number is reached
Device Data Cache Batch Write Timeout (Seconds)
Triggers batch write to cache after timeout even if the threshold is not reached
texts.DisplayName:Artizan.IoT.Message.Cache.La: Device Data Latest Value Cache Expiration Time (Seconds)
Redis expiration time for the latest property data of device data
texts.DisplayName:Artizan.IoT.Message.Cache.Hi: Device Data Historical Data Retention Period (Seconds)
Maximum retention period of historical data in the cache
